allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: replace CORS middleware with custom handler for proper preflight

- Remove SlowAPIMiddleware that was blocking OPTIONS requests
- Implement custom CORS middleware that handles OPTIONS immediately
- Return 200 with proper headers for preflight before any other processing
- Keep rate limiter available per-route instead of global middleware

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
